scripts.deploy: mv src/pages/index.astro src/pages/index.dev.astro && mv src/pages/index.prod.astro src/pages/index.astro && mv src/layouts/Layout.astro src/layouts/Layout.dev.astro && mv src/layouts/Layout.prod.astro src/layouts/Layout.astro && npm run build && mv src/pages/index.astro src/pages/index.prod.astro && mv src/pages/index.dev.astro src/pages/index.astro && mv src/layouts/Layout.astro src/layouts/Layout.prod.astro && mv src/layouts/Layout.dev.astro src/layouts/Layout.astro && git add dist -f && git commit -m "Deploy to production" && git subtree push --prefix dist origin gh-pages
